biotools.summary: E2G is a tool that maps a large set of EST and cDNA sequences to a user-supplied genomic sequence.  The use of pre-computed indexed data structures increases the efficiency of the sequence comparison process, allowing a large amount of data to be mapped within a reasonable timeframe.

bioschemas.name: E2G
